description:
Imagine if you could go to the airport whenever you wanted to...
Well, now you can, in this aviation and puzzle game for all aviation fans!

【I am an Air Traffic Controller - AIRPORT HERO】, the first Nintendo Switch release,
is a popular series in which you become an Air Traffic Controller and give instructions to aircraft.

The first setting is at Haneda Airport. Skillfully use the 4 runways, and keep the skies safe 
using calm judgement and quick-thinking instructions! 

The Nintendo Switch version has been completely redesigned with even more realistic
airport and aircraft visuals.  Enjoy the powerful realism!

There are a total of 16 stages!  Enjoy 3D puzzles with precise control instructions according to different situations!

The game concept of giving air traffic control instructions to aircraft set in an airport, has 
gained popularity, and since the release of the PC game in 1998, it has been a series that 
has been loved for over 20 years.

The AIRPORT HERO series has touched so many people in Japan over the years that some were inspired to become real air traffic controllers or pilots.

The secret of the game's popularity is that it can be played easily by beginners and those without a detailed knowledge.


The Nintendo Switch version can be easily enjoyed anytime, anywhere in portable mode, and when played using a TV or monitor, the powerful airport will spread out in front of you!

Experience the improved Nintendo Switch version of Air Traffic Control with realistic graphics and sounds!
*Description by the manufacturer.
name: I am an Air Traffic Controller - AIRPORT HERO HANEDA
intro:
"I am an Air Traffic Controller - AIRPORT HERO HANEDA"
Is finally here on Nintendo Switch™!
